subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Sant Sampraday: Ramanandi, Dadupanthi, Bishnoi, Jasnathi, etc.
question_en: Who is the founder of Ramanandi Sampraday?
question_hi: रामनंदी सम्प्रदाय के संस्थापक कौन हैं?
explanation_en: Ramananda was the founder of Ramanandi Sampraday.
explanation_hi: रामानंद रामनंदी सम्प्रदाय के संस्थापक थे।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Sant Sampraday: Ramanandi, Dadupanthi, Bishnoi, Jasnathi, etc.
question_en: Which of the following saints is associated with Dadupanthi Sampraday?
question_hi: दादूपंथी सम्प्रदाय से जुड़े संत कौन हैं?
explanation_en: Dadu Dayal is associated with Dadupanthi Sampraday.
explanation_hi: दादू दयाल दादूपंथी सम्प्रदाय से जुड़े हैं।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Sant Sampraday: Ramanandi, Dadupanthi, Bishnoi, Jasnathi, etc.
question_en: What is the main principle of Bishnoi Sampraday?
question_hi: बिश्नोई सम्प्रदाय का मुख्य सिद्धांत क्या है?
explanation_en: Environmental conservation is the main principle of Bishnoi Sampraday.
explanation_hi: बिश्नोई सम्प्रदाय का मुख्य सिद्धांत पर्यावरण संरक्षण है।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Sant Sampraday: Ramanandi, Dadupanthi, Bishnoi, Jasnathi, etc.
question_en: Who is the founder of Jasnathi Sampraday?
question_hi: जस्नथी सम्प्रदाय के संस्थापक कौन हैं?
explanation_en: Jaswant Singh is the founder of Jasnathi Sampraday.
explanation_hi: जसवंत सिंह जस्नथी सम्प्रदाय के संस्थापक हैं।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Sant Sampraday: Ramanandi, Dadupanthi, Bishnoi, Jasnathi, etc.
question_en: Which of the following saints is associated with Nath Sampraday?
question_hi: नाथ सम्प्रदाय से जुड़े संत कौन हैं?
explanation_en: Gorakhnath is associated with Nath Sampraday.
explanation_hi: गोरखनाथ नाथ सम्प्रदाय से जुड़े हैं।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Sant Sampraday: Ramanandi, Dadupanthi, Bishnoi, Jasnathi, etc.
question_en: What is the main teaching of Dadu Dayal?
question_hi: दादू दयाल का मुख्य शिक्षा क्या है?
explanation_en: Love and compassion is the main teaching of Dadu Dayal.
explanation_hi: प्रेम और दया दादू दयाल की मुख्य शिक्षा है।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Sant Sampraday: Ramanandi, Dadupanthi, Bishnoi, Jasnathi, etc.
question_en: Which of the following is a unique practice of Bishnoi Sampraday?
question_hi: बिश्नोई सम्प्रदाय की एक अनोखी प्रथा कौन सी है?
explanation_en: Tree hugging is a unique practice of Bishnoi Sampraday.
explanation_hi: वृक्ष हugging बिश्नोई सम्प्रदाय की एक अनोखी प्रथा है।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Sant Sampraday: Ramanandi, Dadupanthi, Bishnoi, Jasnathi, etc.
question_en: Who is the founder of Nath Sampraday?
question_hi: नाथ सम्प्रदाय के संस्थापक कौन हैं?
explanation_en: Gorakhnath is the founder of Nath Sampraday.
explanation_hi: गोरखनाथ नाथ सम्प्रदाय के संस्थापक हैं।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Sant Sampraday: Ramanandi, Dadupanthi, Bishnoi, Jasnathi, etc.
question_en: What is the main goal of Jasnathi Sampraday?
question_hi: जस्नथी सम्प्रदाय का मुख्य लक्ष्य क्या है?
explanation_en: Spiritual growth is the main goal of Jasnathi Sampraday.
explanation_hi: आध्यात्मिक विकास जस्नथी सम्प्रदाय का मुख्य लक्ष्य है।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Sant Sampraday: Ramanandi, Dadupanthi, Bishnoi, Jasnathi, etc.
question_en: Which of the following saints is associated with Ramanandi Sampraday?
question_hi: रामनंदी सम्प्रदाय से जुड़े संत कौन हैं?
explanation_en: Ramananda is associated with Ramanandi Sampraday.
explanation_hi: रामानंद रामनंदी सम्प्रदाय से जुड़े हैं।
